title:
The week of September 16, 2009 three stars died.  One was Mary Travers, one was Henry Gibson but for the life of me I can\'t remember who the third one was.  I know it was a male, and all three died from Cancer.  



Can you find the answer for me.



Thank you,

--debi
text:
Ok,generally we stick to issues about Southeastern North Carolina, but
this question was driving me crazy, too, so I had to look it up. It
was actor Patrick Swayze.
